amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the funds for the Public Housing Operating Fund by $562,150,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Public Housing Operating fund by $56,215,000, and apply the savings to the deficit reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 264 (Roll no. 430).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 264 (Roll no. 430).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
